Summary: I was outside because of the meteor shower, saw this triangular object shoot vertically up, then across from right to left quickly.
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around August 11th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was standing outside a little after 10:00 p.m. just staring up at the sky. it had been announced that there was a meteor shower that was supposed to take place tonight (august 11, 2009) so that's why i was out there. all of a sudden i looked over to the right and right above the tree line i saw a lighted object shoot straight up fairly high into the sky. then it quickly stopped and then proceeded to fly over me from right to left. it had both white and red flashing lights, and was in the shape of two triangles that were joined together. i knew it wasn't a plane\helicopter or anything of that sort. my first reaction was to call my boyfriend, who was the one who told me about the meteor shower in the first place. i described the object to him, and he confirmed that what i thought i saw was in fact a ufo.
